realtimeweb.businesssearch.exceptions

Class BusinessSearchException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • realtimeweb.businesssearch.exceptions.BusinessSearchException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountUnconfirmedException, AreaTooLargeException, BusinessUnavailableException, DataUnreadableException, DisconnectionException, ExceededReqsException, InternalErrorException, InvalidCredentialsException, InvalidOAuthCredentialsException, InvalidOAuthUserException, InvalidParameterException, InvalidSignatureException, MissingParameterException, MultipleLocationsException, PasswordTooLongException, UnavailableForLocationException

    public class BusinessSearchException
extends Exception
    A generic exception thrown when there is an error with the Yelp service. The ID indicates if it is a local, client side error (e.g. no internet connection) or if it's a Yelp error. More information about Yelp errors can be found on the Yelp help page Additional information can also sometimes be found by inspecting the "fields" property.
    Author:
    acbart
    See Also:
